attributes.action: Make Strumpshaw the capital of the U.K
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Strumpshaw has 5 population of 5 which is rising every day! It has 2 pubs, a church and a house...Not to mention the Post Office which doesn't sell anything!

Do what is right, make Strumpshaw the capital of the UK!

reasons: False or incomplete name or address information
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
